events.message: I just received my order and the product is damaged with several scratches all over it. I am very disappointed because I expected it to be in perfect condition.
After reviewing the customer's message, the issue has been categorized under Product Defect due to the mention of damage and scratches on the item.
The case has been assigned to agent Maria Gonzalez who specializes in product issues and defect investigations.
Hello, this is Maria from Customer Support. I'm truly sorry to hear that your product arrived damaged. Iâ€™m here to help get this resolved for you as quickly as possible.
Could you please send us pictures of the damage and the packaging so we can better understand the issue and proceed with the next steps?
I have attached photos showing the scratches and damage on the product, including the box which was already crushed when I received it. Please advise what can be done.
Thank you for the photos. We can offer you a replacement product shipped within three business days or a full refund if you prefer. Please let us know which option you would like.
I would prefer to receive the replacement as soon as possible, thank you for the quick response and clear options.
The replacement order has been placed and you will receive a tracking number shortly via email. We appreciate your patience and understanding.
Just following up to confirm that you have received your replacement item and that it is in perfect condition. Please let us know if there is anything else we can assist you with.
Yes, I received the replacement today and it is in excellent condition. Thank you very much for resolving this quickly and professionally.
We are glad the issue was resolved to your satisfaction. Closing this case now, but feel free to contact us anytime if you need assistance in the future.
